code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useSetLang}from"../../../App";import{langNames}from"./langNames";import{ClickAwayListener}from"@mui/material";import{StyledFlag,FlagWrapper,FlagDropdown,StyledIconButton,StyledTooltip}from"./flagsStyles";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Flags(){const[showLangMenu,setShowLangMenu]=useState(false),{lang,setLang}=useSetLang();function showLangOptions(){setShowLangMenu(true);}function changeLang(e){const iconTitle=e.currentTarget.getAttribute("data");setLang(iconTitle);setShowLangMenu(false);}function handleClickAway(){setShowLangMenu(false);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClickAwayListener,{onClickAway:handleClickAway,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FlagWrapper,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FlagDropdown,{showLangMenu:showLangMenu,children:[lang!=='us'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledIconButton,{data:"us",onClick:changeLang,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledTooltip,{title:langNames['us'],placement:"right",arrow:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledFlag,{lang:'us'})})})}),lang!=='tj'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledIconButton,{data:"tj",onClick:changeLang,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledTooltip,{title:langNames['tj'],placement:"right",arrow:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledFlag,{lang:'tj'})})})}),lang!=='ru'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledIconButton,{data:"ru",onClick:changeLang,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledTooltip,{title:langNames['ru'],placement:"right",arrow:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledFlag,{lang:'ru'})})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledIconButton,{onMouseEnter:showLangOptions,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledTooltip,{title:langNames[lang],placement:"right",arrow:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StyledFlag,{lang:lang})})})})]})});}
